abstract: Johnson & Johnson announced late Thursday that it had agreed to buy Cougar Biotechnology for about $1 billion, or $43 a share in cash, in a move aimed at strengthening its position in the cancer drug market.

headline.main: Johnson & Johnson to Buy Cougar Biotech
